Translations.Text: Mi d usan imceggaen nne£, ar Iboahim, s ubecceo, nnan as: "ih, a Nesqucc imezda$ n temdint agi. Imezda$ is, s tidep, d imednas
Inna d: "ni$ degs Lui". Nnan as: "Nekwni, Neeoa sennig akw, i illan degs. A t Naateq, neppa akked twacult is, siwa tameiiut is, ara yilin seg wid igwran
Mi usan imceggaen nne£, ar Lui, i$wbel ilmend nnsen, ur izmir a ten ifukk. Nnan as: "ur ppagwad, ur $webbel. Nekwni a k Naateq, kecc d twacult ik, siwa tameiiut ik, ara yilin seg wid igwran
Ih, nekwni a d Nesse$li ssxev seg igenni, $ef imezda$ n temdint agi, ilmend n laao nnsen
Ni$ Neooa d segs, assekni iberrzen, i ugdud ipmeyyizen
Ar Madian, gmat sen Cuaayeb. Inna: "a yagdud iw! Aabdet Oebbi, gganit ass aneggaru, ur oouout di tmurt d ifessaden
Nekoen t. Tewwet iten zzenzla. Gwran d, d loeppat, deg ixxamen nnsen
Aad akked Tamud - ni$ iban awen d seg ixxamen nnsen -, icebbee asen Cciian igiten nnsen. Issuffe$ iten seg ubrid, nitni pfeooioen
